content:
Sure, here are 10 ways a Batman symbol could be printed in up to 3 words per idea:

1. Matte black ink
2. Metallic foil finish
3. Glow-in-the-dark
4. UV spot gloss
5. Embossed emblem
6. Die-cut shape
7. Holographic effect
8. Raised texture print
9. Watercolor style
10. Vintage distressed look
